summary:
### May 2025 Summary for BuidlGuidl/grants.buidlguidl.com

- **Major Features/Improvements:**
  - Merged PR #145 introduced eligibility criteria for grant applications based on completed SpeedRun Ethereum challenges, enhancing the application process.
  - Merged PR #144 updated builder links from BG3.5 to SRE, ensuring grant completion logic aligns with the new SRE framework.

- **Issues Closed:**
  - Issue #143 was closed, addressing the need to reference SRE builds instead of BG3.5 builds in grant completion.
  - Issue #142 was closed, updating grant eligibility criteria to utilize SpeedRun Ethereum data.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - The focus this month was on transitioning from BG3.5 to SRE, improving grant application eligibility, and ensuring all references and logic are aligned with the new system.

topIssues.title: Update grant completion to reference to SRE builds and not bg3.5 builds
Update grant eligibility criteria to use SpeedRunEthereum data

topPRs.title: Add SpeedRun Ethereum completed challenges eligibility criteria to apply for a grant
Update builders links from BG3.5 to SRE and SRE builds logic on grant completion
